name: pho real
description:
Its Pho Real! 

wasd to move

space to drop soup down

instructions:

Recharge magic your furniture by placing soup (spacebar) on or near them. Get more soup by pressing space while on the cauldron. Keep at least one meter up until the timer runs out to win, lose all your magic furniture and its game over.

Credits

Ginny Xia, Jakob Gibson, Adrian Cogswell, Cheyenne Moshtagh, Lei Li, Xuan Ming Wang, Yilin Sun
